channel.title: Persistent Data Structure on The long way through Software Craftsmanship
channel.description: Recent content in Persistent Data Structure on The long way through Software Craftsmanship

item.title: kata: persistent linked list
item.description:
I’ve just written a new kata, about a persistent linked list.

It is using the same project as for the linked list kata.

For now, only the add, contains and size methods are implemented.

If you have any comments or code review, please let me know
